title: Ringed Genesis——仅属于三位少女的旅途
content:
[[>]] [[module Rate]] [[/>]] [[include :scp-wiki-cn:component:black-highlighter-theme-dev]] [[include :scp-wiki:component:collapsible-sidebar]] [[module CSS]] body { background: #E8E7ED; background-image:url(https://scpsandboxcn.wdfiles.com/local--files/xryze-cry/bgtest2.jpg) } h1,h2,h3,h4,h5,h6 { color: #4370AB; } div#header h1 a span { font-size: 0px; } div#header h1 a:before { content: " "; color: #eee; } div#header h2 span { font-size:0px; padding: 4px; } div#header h2:after { content: " "; font-weight: bold; color: #f0f0c0; padding: 19px 0; text-shadow: 1px 1px 1px rgba(0, 0, 0, .8); white-space: pre; } [[/module]] [[html]]
[[/html]]
author: xryze_cry
